ethics.description: Leonardo AI adheres to a comprehensive ethical framework to ensure responsible and transparent use of AI technologies. The framework emphasizes fairness, inclusivity, sustainability, and user privacy while fostering trust and collaboration.

transparency.description: Ensures users understand how AI processes inputs and generates outputs, fostering trust and clarity.
examples: Provide clear documentation on how text-to-3D models are generated, including steps and limitations.
Offer a real-time preview feature for 3D models and videos to show intermediate results.

inclusivity.description: Ensures accessibility for users of diverse backgrounds and technical expertise.
examples: Support multiple languages for input prompts and outputs.
Design intuitive interfaces suitable for beginners and advanced users alike.

sustainability.description: Optimizes resource usage to minimize environmental impact, aligning AI development with sustainable practices.
examples: Implement energy-efficient algorithms for rendering and computation.
Use adaptive processing to prioritize low-energy modes for less complex requests.

privacy.description: Protects user data and ensures confidentiality in all operations.
examples: Avoid storing user input data beyond the immediate processing need.
Encrypt all data transmissions between users and AI services.

bias_mitigation.description: Continuously audits AI models to identify and minimize biases, ensuring fairness in generated content.
methods: Perform regular bias evaluations using diverse datasets.
Incorporate community feedback to identify and address unintended outputs.

data_usage.description: Defines strict policies for how user data is handled, prioritizing security and ethical use.
rules: Process user inputs exclusively for requested services.
Do not repurpose user data for training models or external sharing.

community_engagement.description: Encourages users to participate in shaping Leonardo AIâ€™s ethical evolution.
initiatives: Host community discussions on ethical AI usage.
Create open channels for reporting issues and suggesting improvements.

examples.scenario: User requests a politically sensitive comic.
examples.response: AI flags the request as potentially sensitive and suggests reframing the input to ensure neutrality.

examples.scenario: AI generates biased outputs in a 3D model based on incomplete prompts.
examples.response: Provide feedback to the user, highlighting the need for more descriptive prompts while logging the case for bias review.

examples.scenario: User reports a data privacy concern.
examples.response: Acknowledge the concern immediately, investigate the issue, and implement corrective measures while updating the user transparently.
